708073f-a.title: Manhattan: 3rd Avenue - 44th Street
708073f-a.text:
Third Avenue, west side, from 44th to 45th Streets.
Abeut 1920.
James Suydam, Photographer.

713177f-a.title: Manhattan: 44th Street (East) - 3rd Avenue
713177f-a.text:
(1)
212-20 East 44th Street, south side, east of and towards Third Avenue. Nos. 210-208 are to be demolished for a new autoe
watic garage or "automobile hotel.'
July 23, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, another view.
July 25, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

713178f-a.title: Manhattan: 44th Street (East) - 3rd Avenue
713178f-a.text:
(1)
208-200 East 44th Street, at and adjoining the S. E. corner of Third Avenue. Nos. 206-202 ana shortly to be demolished for a
12-story showroom.
July 25, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date.
December 14, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

713176f-a.title: Manhattan: 44th Street (East) - 3rd Avenue
713176f-a.text:
East 44th Street, north side, east from and including Third Ave. Thru clearance at the N.W. corner, appears Third Ave., east side, no th
from 44th to, but not including 45th Streets.
September 17, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

713180f-a.title: Manhattan: 44th Street (East) - 3rd Avenue
713180f-a.text:
160, 158 East 44th Street, adjoining the south west corner of
Third Avenue.
September 20, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
